amendment.description: To impose reporting requirements relating to the SBIR and STTR programs of the Small Business Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2053 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2053 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4192) To impose reporting requirements relating to the SBIR and STTR programs of the Small Business Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2053 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2053 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2301.
